about_the_game:
Start with one hex tile with a high striker and use 1000 strikes to rack up the highest score possible and cement your place on the global leaderboard.

  • Tokens are gained from each strike (from an initial possible range) that can be used in the shop to purchase upgrades.
  • Increase the token range of each striker with tasty treats such as ice cream and corn dogs (treats can be enhanced with condiments).
  • Tokens are multiplied when strikers are upgraded with stronger hammers.
  • Place other hex tiles such as juggling clowns and one man bands to further multiply tokens gained from strikes.
  • Use the magnifying glass to uncover descriptions and statistics on all game items.
  • Positioning of the various hex tiles is important, with various synergies to be discovered and used to your advantage in maximizing your score.

short_description: High Striker, the classic funfair strongman game, is now a roguelike deckbuilder. Strategically place hex tiles with strikers, gain tokens and unlock upgrades from the shop to rack up the highest possible score from 1000 strikes.
